name: A.I.LIENS
description:
A.I.LIENS

A 3rd Person Shooter RPG with Advanced A.I., Abilities, Player Stats, Inventory, Loot, Dialogue, Interaction, Firearms, Melee Weapons, Weapon Upgrades, Save/Load and much more

FEATURES:

Many different enemy types: Trooper, Sniper, Boomer, Heavy Gunner
Melee system and melee enemies like gruntling, spiderling and spider boss!
Different weapons like Shotgun, Pistol, Assault Rifle, Heavy Machine Gun, Plasma Rifle, Rocket Launcher and Sniper Rifle, Electric Gun and Flame thrower
Vending Machine - purchase weapons with in-game currency
Advanced Enemy A.I.
Advanced A.I. Companions like turrets and soldiers
Save/Load System
Loot System
Player Screen with four tabs: Character, Weapons, Armor, Abilities
Stat System - XP, Bonus, Critical Hit Chance, Armor
Primary and Secondary Weapon Slots
Wearable Armor Items - Torso, Head, and Legs
Ability System - Dash, Energy Barrier, Turret Companion, Healing Probe, Slam
Weapon Upgrade System
Weapon Crosshair variety
and much more!
